room_title: Escape room "Shadows of the Skunk Ape" by Rabbit Hole Escape Games in Tampa
room_description:
During the summer of 1984, you are completing park ranger training at Cabbage Lake State Park. Meanwhile, the park is also hosting the 2nd annual Cryptozoology Conference. During the event, an item has been stolen from the park. It's up to you to find the missing item and get all campers to safety due to approaching heavy storms.
You discover there's a mysterious protector in the park - the lurking Skunk Ape - and he's quite upset with the thieves. Maybe you can join forces with this odd creature to accomplish your mission?
